body:
i'm thankful that i fell asleep at like 9:15 last night and slept soundly until my alarm this morning. i'm thankful to have worked slightly harder to make sure that our room was [completely dark](http://abcnews.go.com/Health/sleeping-rooms-lighting-increase-risk-depression-study/story?id=53636492) after reading the results of this small study. i'm thankful for the weird dream i had where i was at some bonnaroo type festival with my coworkers and inflated a massive tent with a tiny pump, then rode around on a golf kart looking for booze.

i'm thankful to have made soup yesterday, after not having really done a sunday meal prep for a while, either leaving it to d (thankful to d) or doing more impromptu sessions during the week (since on my last medicine, i found that my normal love of leftovers would fade and by the third day eating something i would find it increasingly difficult to eat it), to have made a dutch oven full of soup yesterday. i'm thankful for the pleasure and satisfaction of cooking and the privilege time to do it in. i'm thankful for the way that leftovers store labor as well as food.

i'm thankful for this hilarious profile of [tiffany haddish by caity weaver](https://www.gq.com/story/tiffany-haddish-profile-2018). i'm thankful for this article about [trying to improve monopoly](https://theoutline.com/post/3554/monopoly-new-rules?zd=1&zi=i2dbyhwo). i'm thankful to have learned about the concept of "[ambient humanity.](https://dancohen.org/2018/03/21/back-to-the-blog/)" i'm thankful for austin walker's review of _far cry 5_, which is so thoughtful and sharp. i'm thankful [kim and kanye took nori](https://twitter.com/KimKardashian/status/977950626163273728) to the march for our lives. i'm thankful for [this unintentionally hilarious scene](https://twitter.com/fakeirl/status/977337439286042626) of keanu djing from the bizarre and offensive _knock knock,_ which is the most uncanny valley live action movie i've ever seen. i'm thankful for [the ring (2002)](https://twitter.com/Sonny5ideUp/status/976621169960013824).

i'm thankful that we decided over the weekend to rewatch last season of _the americans_ in advance of the final season, which starts this week. i'm thankful for matthew rhys and keri russell, who are just so good at being the characters they play. i'm thankful for the show and am sad that it will be finally over, but i'm thankful to get to find out what happens and that i know that eventually, we'll be able to rewatch the whole thing, which won't be the same as seeing it for the first time but will still feel good.
normalized_markdown:
i'm thankful that i fell asleep at like 9:15 last night and slept soundly until my alarm this morning. i'm thankful to have worked slightly harder to make sure that our room was [completely dark](http://abcnews.go.com/Health/sleeping-rooms-lighting-increase-risk-depression-study/story?id=53636492) after reading the results of this small study. i'm thankful for the weird dream i had where i was at some bonnaroo type festival with my coworkers and inflated a massive tent with a tiny pump, then rode around on a golf kart looking for booze.

i'm thankful to have made soup yesterday, after not having really done a sunday meal prep for a while, either leaving it to d (thankful to d) or doing more impromptu sessions during the week (since on my last medicine, i found that my normal love of leftovers would fade and by the third day eating something i would find it increasingly difficult to eat it), to have made a dutch oven full of soup yesterday. i'm thankful for the pleasure and satisfaction of cooking and the privilege time to do it in. i'm thankful for the way that leftovers store labor as well as food.

i'm thankful for this hilarious profile of [tiffany haddish by caity weaver](https://www.gq.com/story/tiffany-haddish-profile-2018). i'm thankful for this article about [trying to improve monopoly](https://theoutline.com/post/3554/monopoly-new-rules?zd=1&zi=i2dbyhwo). i'm thankful to have learned about the concept of "[ambient humanity.](https://dancohen.org/2018/03/21/back-to-the-blog/)" i'm thankful for austin walker's review of _far cry 5_, which is so thoughtful and sharp. i'm thankful [kim and kanye took nori](https://twitter.com/KimKardashian/status/977950626163273728) to the march for our lives. i'm thankful for [this unintentionally hilarious scene](https://twitter.com/fakeirl/status/977337439286042626) of keanu djing from the bizarre and offensive _knock knock,_ which is the most uncanny valley live action movie i've ever seen. i'm thankful for [the ring (2002)](https://twitter.com/Sonny5ideUp/status/976621169960013824).

i'm thankful that we decided over the weekend to rewatch last season of _the americans_ in advance of the final season, which starts this week. i'm thankful for matthew rhys and keri russell, who are just so good at being the characters they play. i'm thankful for the show and am sad that it will be finally over, but i'm thankful to get to find out what happens and that i know that eventually, we'll be able to rewatch the whole thing, which won't be the same as seeing it for the first time but will still feel good.
